info.title: BlueprintClient
info.description: Azure Blueprints Client provides access to blueprint definitions, assignments, and artifacts, and related blueprint operations.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

200.description: OK -- retrieved list of blueprint definitions.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

put.description: Create or update a blueprint definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

get.description: List artifacts for a given blueprint definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

requestBody.description: Blueprint artifact to create or update.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

get.description: List published versions of given blueprint definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

200.description: OK -- all published versions of blueprint definition retrieved.

get.description: Get a published version of a blueprint definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

put.description: Publish a new version of the blueprint definition with the latest artifacts. Published blueprint definitions are immutable.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

requestBody.description: Published Blueprint to create or update.

delete.description: Delete a published version of a blueprint definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

200.description: OK -- published version of blueprint definition deleted.

get.description: List artifacts for a version of a published blueprint definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

200.description: OK -- artifacts of a version of published blueprint definition retrieved.

get.description: Get an artifact for a published blueprint definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

200.description: OK -- artifact of published blueprint definition retrieved.

kind.description: Specifies the kind of blueprint artifact.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

dependsOn.description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before the specified artifact.

ArtifactPropertiesBase.description: Common properties shared by different artifacts.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

AzureResourceBase.description: Common properties for all Azure resources.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

layout.description: Layout view of the blueprint definition for UI reference.

versions.description: Published versions of this blueprint definition.

BlueprintResourcePropertiesBase.description: Shared properties between all blueprint resources.

lastModified.description: Last modified time of this blueprint definition.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this blueprint definition.

BlueprintResourceStatusBase.description: Shared status properties between all blueprint resources.

BlueprintStatus.description: The status of the blueprint. This field is readonly.

allowedValues.description: Array of allowed values for this parameter.

type.description: Allowed data types for Resource Manager template parameters.

ParameterDefinition.description: Represent a parameter with constrains and metadata.

ParameterDefinitionCollection.description: A dictionary hold parameter name and its metadata.

strongType.description: StrongType for UI to render rich experience during blueprint assignment. Supported strong types are resourceType, principalId and location.

ParameterValue.description: Value for the specified parameter. Can be either 'value' or 'reference' but not both.

ParameterValueCollection.description: A dictionary for parameters and their corresponding values.

PolicyAssignmentArtifact.description: Blueprint artifact that applies a Policy assignment.

policyDefinitionId.description: Azure resource ID of the policy definition.

resourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group placeholder to which the policy will be assigned.

PolicyAssignmentArtifactProperties.description: Properties of a Policy assignment blueprint artifact.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

blueprintName.description: Name of the published blueprint definition.

PublishedBlueprintProperties.description: Schema for published blueprint definition properties.

dependsOn.description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before this resource group.

location.description: Location of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group location will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

name.description: Name of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group name will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

ResourceGroupDefinition.description: Represents an Azure resource group in a blueprint definition.

ResourceGroupDefinitionCollection.description: A dictionary which maps resource group placeholders to the resource groups which will be created.

ResourceGroupTagCollection.description: A dictionary of resource group tag values.

ResourceGroupValueCollection.description: A dictionary which maps resource group placeholders to the resource groups which will be created.

operation.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

ResourceProviderOperation.description: Supported operations of this resource provider.

value.description: List of operations supported by this resource provider.

ResourceProviderOperationList.description: Results of the request to list operations.

RoleAssignmentArtifact.description: Blueprint artifact that applies a Role assignment.

principalIds.description: Array of user or group identities in Azure Active Directory. The roleDefinition will apply to each identity.

resourceGroup.description: RoleAssignment will be scope to this resourceGroup. If empty, it scopes to the subscription.

roleDefinitionId.description: Azure resource ID of the RoleDefinition.

RoleAssignmentArtifactProperties.description: Properties of a Role assignment blueprint artifact.

secretVersion.description: The version of the secret to use. If left blank, the latest version of the secret is used.

SecretValueReference.description: Reference to a Key Vault secret.

targetScope.description: The scope where this blueprint definition can be assigned.

SharedBlueprintProperties.description: Shared Schema for both blueprintProperties and publishedBlueprintProperties.

TemplateArtifact.description: Blueprint artifact that deploys a Resource Manager template.

resourceGroup.description: If applicable, the name of the resource group placeholder to which the Resource Manager template blueprint artifact will be deployed.

template.description: The Resource Manager template blueprint artifact body.

TemplateArtifactProperties.description: Properties of a Resource Manager template blueprint artifact.

id.description: Azure resource ID of the Key Vault.

keyVaultReference.description: Specifies the link to a Key Vault.

PublishedBlueprintVersionIdParameter.name: versionId
PublishedBlueprintVersionIdParameter.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

ScopeParameter.name: scope
ScopeParameter.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.
